thread.title: Japanese Craftsmanship Inspires the New adidas Matchcourt RX LTD
thread.title_full: Japanese Craftsmanship Inspires the New adidas Matchcourt RX LTD

author: Renz Ofiaza
title: Japanese Craftsmanship Inspires the New adidas Matchcourt RX LTD
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
Brand: adidas 
Model: Matchcourt RX LTD
Key Features: Sashiko-style stitching on the shoe’s blue canvas, with contrasting red for its inner and outsole. With an emphasis on detail, a monochromatic leather upper and a premium nubuck toe offers originality and maximum board control.
Release Date: Saturday, April 1
Price: $90
Availability: Select adidas retailers nationwide
Editor’s Notes: Inspired by traditional Japanese craftmanship, this all new, limited edition Matchcourt RX LTD is a lifestyle upgrade of the classic Matchcourt silhouette. The model’s premium makeover is created for style and simply enhanced for skate performance.
In case you missed it, peep the adidas Skateboarding team skating in the Matchcourt RX .
